title: Neocon Indicted
author: VD
content_html:
John Bolton indicted under the Espionage Act. The 26-page indictment has just been UNSEALED and it’s HUGE! There are 18 FEDERAL COUNTS! He’s been indicted on ESPIONAGE ACT statutes. Bolton has been under investigation for the unlawful handling of classified information…reportedly sharing highly classified material with his wife and daughter over email, according to several sources.

DISCUSS ON SG

The 26-page indictment has just been UNSEALED and it’s HUGE! There are 18 FEDERAL COUNTS! He’s been indicted on ESPIONAGE ACT statutes. Bolton has been under investigation for the unlawful handling of classified information…reportedly sharing highly classified material with his wife and daughter over email, according to several sources.
